name: ICS Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the "ICS"(Idoneus Citadel Sacrament) school of design.

name: ICS Elite Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the elite ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the "ICS"(Idoneus Citadel Sacrament) school of design.
